Class Reminder

java.lang.Object
Reminder
public class Reminder extends Object
Represents a reminder notification with its scheduling details and status. Tracks reminder ID, associated user, message content, scheduled date/time, and delivery status.
Author:
Omar Sayed

      static int counter

  • Constructor Details

    • Reminder

      public Reminder(int userId, String message, Date reminderDate)
      Constructs a new Reminder with auto-incremented ID and default unsent status.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user associated with this reminder
      message - the content of the reminder message
      reminderDate - the date and time when the reminder should be triggered

    • Reminder

      public Reminder(int reminderId, int userId, String message, Date reminderDate, boolean isSent)
      Constructs a Reminder with all fields specified.
      Parameters:
      reminderId - the specific ID to assign to this reminder
      userId - the ID of the user associated with this reminder
      message - the content of the reminder message
      reminderDate - the date and time when the reminder should be triggered
      isSent - whether the reminder has already been sent

      public boolean isSent()
      Returns:
      true if the reminder has been sent, false otherwise

      Marks this reminder as having been sent.

      Marks this reminder as not having been sent.

      Updates the message content of this reminder.

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the reminder in CSV format.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
